testing.title: Car Accident
testing.newsDescription: Two people were severely injured and sent to the hospital. The accident has caused serious traffic at Jay st.

testing.title: Taylor Swift and Kanye West spotted at Starbucks
testing.newsDescription: Just saw Taylor Swift and Kanye West at Starbucks!! Looks like they have burried the hatchet?

testing.title: NYU Hackathon 2016
testing.newsDescription: There is a Hackathon going on at the NYU School of Engineering with lots free food and swag! It's packed with students working on awesome projects.
